website_summaries.verdict: Attractive mid-sized gift bags with gorgeous prints and tissue paper. Handles aren't as durable as the bag material, but this flaw doesn't detract from their gift-giving appeal.
pros: These bags feature colorful marbled and mosaic designs with gold accents that make them practical for very special occasions, including weddings and showers
Bottoms are reinforced for added structure
cons: Ribbon handles will slip out of the eyelets, making it difficult to carry with weighty items inside
Some gripe that they are smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the tissue paper like it says
customer_reviews.text: Bags were good and strong. Did not come with the tissue paper like it says it does. Pretty disappointed because I paid the price I did $11.99 for just 4 gift bags when I needed the bags and tissue paper.........UGH
customer_reviews.author: Regan Wehrung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Another review mentioned the handles wouldn't stay in place, but the aglets on the ends of the string have a slit, and I had to move it into place, but after that I had no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use the handles, so the bag is useless
customer_reviews.text: These are unusable due to the handles pulling out of the hole as soon as you try to pick up the bag! I even tried to put knots in the ribbon, but it still didn’t work (and looked even worse). I ordered 8 bags, and every single one had the same issue. Only plus is that they are pretty, but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully colored gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Used for bridal party wedding day gifts. The colors went well with my beach wedding colors and the bags were sturdy and fit both wedding day romper and bridesmaid survival bag perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: YOU WON'T FIND THESE AT YOUR LOCAL WALMART
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BAG. VERY PRETTY AND DIFFERENT FROM WHAT YOU MIGHT FIND AT YOUR LOCAL "DOLLAR STORE" OR ELSEWHERE. I WOULD LOVE, HOWEVER TO BE ABLE TO GET SOMETHING LIKE THESE IN A LARGER SIZE..THESE ARE BEST SUITABLE FOR SMALLER GIFTS..
customer_reviews.author: LJ Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest bags ever! Very sturdy, great designs, and matching gift tags. Came with 8 sheets of white tissue paper as well.
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Gift Bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a great deal. I bought them with a gift I purchased. I always forget bags. These are very sturdy and will hold quite a bit ever for a smaller bag. I would say the bags are more small then medium. They also look very nice and I got lots of questions on where they were purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: NOT MEDIUM BAGS
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely cute and well made but if you're like me and the size description doesn't really mean anything, these are not a MEDIUM bag. They're small. I got these for a baby shower and the very small gift that I got would not fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mj R.

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price! I used this bag for a bridal shower gift for a friend and she commented on my bag especially out of everyone else’s. They’re eye catching and classy. I’ll be buying more of these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: Pretty packaging. 💗
customer_reviews.text: These little gift bags are perfect for small gifts, & very unique design. Pastels, & pretty. Thank you Amazon, my mom loved the picture, & soft brushed colors. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Fyerr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Pastel Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are prefect gift bags! Used them for a friend’s birthday. She loved the pastel colors, with the gold accents. They coordinate well together, especially when giving more than one gift.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and sturdy bags but need more tissue paper included
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because of the tissue paper - they only included one sheet per bag which is not enough to cover the gift inside the bag. Otherwise, I love the design/colors and they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carey H

customer_reviews.title: These bags are lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for birthday gift wrap and will be used for girlfriends. The colors are primarily shades of pinks and blues and would be suitable for children’s gifts. They all have ribbon handles, white tissue paper was included.
customer_reviews.author: SKRN

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty gift bags
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful gift bags with lovely matching tissue paper. They're unique and add to the specialness of giving a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Grainger

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical after reading some reviews about the handles, but those are just people who don't know what there doing lol. The bags are super cute and I will definitely order more of these in the future. I feel like for the price point they are a steal! Got lots of compliments on these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: On the smaller side.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t call these “medium” sized gift bags.. they are def on the smaller side. The quality is great, design is super cute. But they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi & David Blake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in Person Too
customer_reviews.text: The bags are beautiful and look more upscale than traditional gift bags. It’s also nice that tissue paper is included!
customer_reviews.author: PaulV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bags! I used them to create special Christmas gifts for my friends. Each bag design fit the personality of my friends! Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Go to gift bag!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my go-to gift bags bc they can be used for any occasion and their design is nice. They are sturdy and I would say a medium size for everyday type gift giving!
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute colors and good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these bags for Mother’s Day, especially the gold design. Good price too, and I was surprised it also came with tissue paper which was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Kailie Buster

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the picture. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design of these bags. Sturdier than expected. The only downside was a very small spot of tacky glue on the back of each bag that stuck them together. Would def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bags come with tissue paper. They are also beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: tnnskttykat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bags!
customer_reviews.text: The bags are very pretty and quality material and construction. If the tissue was less stiff and there was twice as much i would have given an overall five star rating. I had to supplement with quality tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Cute bags
customer_reviews.text: Needed gift bags for presents. Didn’t want to go to the store and look for bags and instead I bought these. They’re so nice in person. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Unique bags
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bags. Different than what you find in stores. I have someone 2 books (each about 250 pages) & I had no concerns about the bag ripping.
customer_reviews.author: GoneGirl

customer_reviews.title: Durable little bags
customer_reviews.text: Not only are they cute but the quality is great And the bags are very thick and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Joaquin

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect the bags to be as sturdy as they were, but I’m glad! I stuffed it with so many goodies for a ladies weekend out of town 😁 They absolutely loved the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Maris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift bags
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful in person and also durable. The product is not of cheap material, it’s strong and durable paper bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but good
customer_reviews.text: Was in a pinch an needed bags for a present and these were perfect! A touch expensive, but good quality and look really good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous items.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift bags. Looked perfect for my daughters party. Loved them all and worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the bags were a little bigger but they are very nice. Design and quality are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, good quality, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased journals and devotionals as gifts for a seminar and needed nice inexpensiveway to package them. The bags were a very nice touch to make the gift more polished and the books fit perfectly. I would not hesitate to order again. I was initially worries about quality and enough tissue paper. The bags were quite sturdy and there was just enough tissue paper included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love it and so does the person who received the gift!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Perfect for really any feminine occasion. Used for a gift bag bridal brunch. Will get more just to have on hand for gifts!

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bags, love that they came with tags and tissue paper.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So cute in person!! I love these bags. Great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but pretty small for a medium sized bag
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute gift bags and I love them but they seem to only fit very small gifts compared to the average medium-sized gift bags in store.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great For Small Gifts
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I’d hoped, but super cute and perfect for smaller gifts. Love the colors.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: MUCH SMALLER than anticipated. Ordered Medium, and it would qualify as a Small.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Putting a baby outfit in one and some lotions in another.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The colors were so cute! The photos don’t do them justice. I really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Annastasia T.

customer_reviews.title: Ribbon Handles fall out
customer_reviews.text: While the design is beautiful on these bags, the handles are very poor quality. They fall out of the bag with no effort at all. I'll have to tape them down in order for these to work.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the quality, designs, and colors of these bags! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together bags, not flimsy at all! Love the look!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, design on bags are great.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are super cute and the prefect medium sized bags!

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: This set is sooooo cute, the quality was surprisingly great, came with tissue paper, name tags, and the price was awesome

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect bags for the gifts I bought them for.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! Did NOT come with tissue paper as described!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with Tissue Paper!!! Very upsetting ordered for a gift expecting tissue paper to be included as described.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags are beautiful. They are excellent and at a good price.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Straps need to be tied in a knot to add strength. BUT they're super cute! Only one side is metallic btw. Great bags for a medium sized gift. Definitely needs more tissue paper than they send you. Gotta make it look fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not all that
customer_reviews.text: Very cute to grab when an event pops up !
customer_reviews.author: Tara Sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Got these for all the birthdays in May, everyone loved their gift bag! The colors were cute and the convenience of having the paper already was nice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bags
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, came promptly. Really pretty pastel colors. Perfect for a unicorn or mermaid party!

customer_reviews.title: Really small !
customer_reviews.text: I like them but these ARE NOT MEDIUM SIZE. This is a small size, for a pretty small object.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and reusable!
customer_reviews.text: These bags were perfect for my daughters 6th birthday. They are sturdy and completely reusable. They are a little small but worth for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love These and they are exactly what I was Expecting.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags!
customer_reviews.text: This bags were ordered to gift prizes at a ladies' tea. They arrived in a timely manner; attractive and sturdy. ALL GOOD!

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. The patterns are so gorgeous. Used them for my bridesmaids gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful designs . I wish I didn’t have to use them for gifts and keep them myself

customer_reviews.title: Cute bags!
customer_reviews.text: The bags were well made and came exactly like I'd hoped. Two thumbs up!

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Good to have at home for last minute gift giving

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but....
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute for gift giving but too pricey for only 4 bags

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with tissue paper!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to receive the gift bag AND the tissue paper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable gift bags
customer_reviews.text: I loved how sturdy the bags were. Would have been amazing if they were larger but it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great quality
customer_reviews.text: super cute, great quality too!! The strings stayed on all 4 bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot, perfect for the bridal shower I bought them for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful bags
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful gift bags with a nice shine to them.
customer_reviews.author: chic

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Pretty Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These pretty bags look great and are so convenient! The only reason I gave four stars is because one of the bags had faulty strings that kept slipping out. I simply made a little knot on each end and all was well. It was the only bag in the package that had that problem. The bags look very nice when they are put together and ready to go...good for birthdays and many other holidays.
customer_reviews.author: FriendOfGod

customer_reviews.title: Very cute high quality bags!
customer_reviews.text: Actually went beyond my expectation! The quality on these is verrrrryyy nice! I used them as bridesmaid proposal gift bags :) My friends loved them! The gold foil on these is fantastic. Nice thick quality paper too, bags are very sturdy, and the colors are beautiful. OH! and comes with tissue paper so didn't have to buy any :D (2 large pieces per bag, perfect amount).
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I was running out of time to get everything for my daughter's birthday, so I decided to save myself a trip and order gift bags from amazon. Since the bags are sold with tissue paper, it was great to have it all together when I ultimately put her gift together the last minute.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These gift bags are absolutely gorgeous. I ordered the medium size and they were a perfect size. The quality is excellent as I shipped 2 bags out and they arrived in perfect condition. I will otder them again in all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: PRISCILLA YAMAKAWA

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Gift Bags
customer_reviews.text: These gift bags were perfect for my needs. It came with tissue paper as well. The bags were about the size of a 5 X 7 picture frame. The colors were very pretty. Each has a different design and they are very durable and well made. The recipients all loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift Bags
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this bags in the past because they are beautiful and so durable. I'm sure I'll be purchasing them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Rusnack

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Comes out to about $3 a bag, but they are so cute & very durable. They also come with a little matching blank note card and gold ribbon to tie to each bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gembica

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: These bags are on the small side of medium. They're made out of what feels like thick card stock or thin cardboard, but they're not glued well and come undone easily. They're very pretty and a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaFamanda

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These bags are waaaay smaller than I imagined. That aside, they are gorgeous and extremely durable. They even come with matching string and tags for each bag. I wish I got a size bigger but I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cutest gift bags of 3
customer_reviews.text: I filled these gift bags up to capacity and the designs are so cute ! Name tags come with them and tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bags
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bags. I wish the tissue paper came in pastel colors to match the bags. And the handles worked, but i did not have the confidence they were sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy, pretty gift bags but on the petite side
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, classy gift bags you won’t find anywhere else. Check measurements though because they’re on the petite side. I had thought they were larger than they are.

customer_reviews.title: Bags are pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the beauty of the bags. They were received being better than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!

product_meta.title: Loveinside Medium Size Gift Bags-Colorful Marble Pattern Gift Bag with Tissue Paper for Shopping,Parties,Wedding, Baby Shower, Craft-4 Pack-7" X 4" X 9"
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY: Sturdy bags,Made of eco friendly and reusable 210gsm cardboard.Nice ribbon handles and supportive reinforced Square bottom.
SIZE:7"L X 4"W X9"H,total 4 pcs bag.（Tissue paper:19.5"X27.5",4Pcs）
BUY NOW RISK FREE: If for any reason, you don't absolutely like it,just return it, and we'll refund every penny (or replace it, if there is a problem).

SUPER CONVENIENT:Use for a fast and simple alternative to standard gift wrapping.Great for birthdays, graduations, baby & bridal showers, and holidays!Create the loveliest of memories for your friends.
PERSONALIZE YOUR GIFT:Coloful Marble Pattern design add a touch of elegant fun to any special occasion,Easy grab and go!
